list.name: Changes
list.comment:
ðŸ”§ Correct dynamic wishlist item display
Fixed an issue with the dynamic display of wishlist items to ensure proper rendering. The previous implementation had a bug, and this commit corrects it by addressing the issue and ensuring that wishlist items are displayed correctly.

task.summary:
ðŸ”— Added PostgreSQL Database Connection Configuration
In this commit, we configured the database connection settings for PostgreSQL in our Laravel project. The following changes were made:
âœ… Updated the .env file to include PostgreSQL as the database connection driver. âš™ï¸ Set the host, port, database name, username, and password to connect to the PostgreSQL database. ðŸ”Œ Enabled the PDO PostgreSQL extension in the PHP configuration (php.ini) on Windows. ðŸ› ï¸ Created a database connection test route and controller to ensure the connection is successful. ðŸ‘ï¸â€ðŸ—¨ï¸ Verified that the PostgreSQL extension is enabled by checking the PHP Info page.
This configuration allows our Laravel application to connect to the PostgreSQL database, ensuring proper database functionality.
#postgresql #laravel #database-connection

âœ¨ [User Authentication and Management Implementation]
ðŸ” Implemented user authentication and management features. - ðŸ—ƒï¸ Created the 'users' table in the database to store user information. - ðŸŒ Implemented user registration, login, and password reset functionality. - ðŸ“ Added user profile management features, allowing users to update their information. - ðŸ”’ Set up user role management for admin and regular users.
ðŸ‘¥ Enabled Team management (optional) and configured related database tables. - ðŸ¢ Created 'teams' and 'team_user' tables for team management. - ðŸš€ Implemented team creation, membership, and invitation features.
ðŸ“§ Integrated email notifications for registration and password reset processes. ðŸ›¡ï¸ Enhanced security measures, including password hashing and CSRF protection. ðŸš¦ Implemented user-friendly error handling and validation messages.

ðŸŒŸ [Avatar/Upload Image Feature Added]
ðŸ“· Implemented the ability for users to upload avatars or profile images. - Users can now upload and set profile pictures. - Added image upload functionality to user profiles. - Supported image formats include JPG, PNG, and GIF.
ðŸ’¾ Images are securely stored in the server's storage directory.
ðŸŽ‰ DONE
ðŸ“Œ Reminder: Don't forget to git pull every day when you open the project.

âœ¨ Implemented e-commerce shop page and backend functionality
ðŸ›’ Developed the shop page to display products. ðŸ“¦ Implemented backend methods for shop management. ðŸ’¼ Integrated product retrieval and display from the database. ðŸ”— Created routes and links for seamless navigation. ðŸ§ª Tested the e-commerce shop functionality for accuracy.
ðŸš€ Implemented dynamic product details display using database data
ðŸ“Š Created a 'show' method in ProductController to fetch product details from the database. ðŸ› Updated product details view to use real product data, including image URLs. ðŸ”— Modified links in the shop view to redirect to product details pages with the correct routes. ðŸ§ª Tested the 'ecommerce_details' method using Postman. ðŸ–¼ï¸ Updated image sources to use 'image_url' for product display.

ðŸ”§ Correct dynamic wishlist item display
Fixed an issue with the dynamic display of wishlist items to ensure proper rendering. The previous implementation had a bug, and this commit corrects it by addressing the issue and ensuring that wishlist items are displayed correctly.

MESSAGE.value:
Added PostgreSQL Database Connection Configuration
In this commit, we configured the database connection settings for PostgreSQL in our Laravel project. The following changes were made:
âœ… Updated the .env file to include PostgreSQL as the database connection driver. âš™ï¸ Set the host, port, database name, username, and password to connect to the PostgreSQL database. Enabled the PDO PostgreSQL extension in the PHP configuration (php.ini) on Windows. ï¸ Created a database connection test route and controller to ensure the connection is successful. ï¸â€ï¸ Verified that the PostgreSQL extension is enabled by checking the PHP Info page.
This configuration allows our Laravel application to connect to the PostgreSQL database, ensuring proper database functionality.
#postgresql #laravel #database-connection

âœ¨ [User Authentication and Management Implementation]
Implemented user authentication and management features. - ï¸ Created the 'users' table in the database to store user information. - Implemented user registration, login, and password reset functionality. - Added user profile management features, allowing users to update their information. - Set up user role management for admin and regular users.
Enabled Team management (optional) and configured related database tables. - Created 'teams' and 'team_user' tables for team management. - Implemented team creation, membership, and invitation features.
Integrated email notifications for registration and password reset processes. ï¸ Enhanced security measures, including password hashing and CSRF protection. Implemented user-friendly error handling and validation messages.

[Avatar/Upload Image Feature Added]
Implemented the ability for users to upload avatars or profile images. - Users can now upload and set profile pictures. - Added image upload functionality to user profiles. - Supported image formats include JPG, PNG, and GIF.
Images are securely stored in the server's storage directory.
DONE
Reminder: Don't forget to git pull every day when you open the project.

âœ¨ Implemented e-commerce shop page and backend functionality
Developed the shop page to display products. Implemented backend methods for shop management. Integrated product retrieval and display from the database. Created routes and links for seamless navigation. Tested the e-commerce shop functionality for accuracy.
Implemented dynamic product details display using database data
Created a 'show' method in ProductController to fetch product details from the database. Updated product details view to use real product data, including image URLs. Modified links in the shop view to redirect to product details pages with the correct routes. Tested the 'ecommerce_details' method using Postman. ï¸ Updated image sources to use 'image_url' for product display.

Correct dynamic wishlist item display
Fixed an issue with the dynamic display of wishlist items to ensure proper rendering. The previous implementation had a bug, and this commit corrects it by addressing the issue and ensuring that wishlist items are displayed correctly.

Fixed an issue with the dynamic display of wishlist items to ensure proper rendering. The previous implementation had a bug, and this commit corrects it by addressing the issue and ensuring that wishlist items are displayed correctly.
